QuestData.Title: Extinguish the Fires
QuestData.Description: The Dark Iron attack took us by surprise. Their saboteurs managed to damage most of our aircraft, steam tanks, and supplies. We were only able to get a few of our bombers airborne.$B$BEvery technician, recruit, and guard I can spare is scrambling to get the others repaired and flight-ready. Our infantry can only hold out for so long. Take this equipment and help extinguish the burning bombers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Using the Firefighting Equipment, extinguish 6 fires at the Ironforge Airfield.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done! My men are working hard on getting our flying machines and steam tanks back into the fight.
